clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in adrenal gland with SUVmax 7.81.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in adrenal gland, suggestive of malignancy.
Mild inflammatory uptake in adrenal gland region.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
